posts.title: What is Lorem Ipsum?
posts.content: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. Lorem Ipsum has been the industry's standard dummy text ever since the 1500s, when an unknown printer took a galley of type and scrambled it to make a type specimen book.

artists.name: Toni Mihajlovski
artists.bio: Toni Mihajlovski is a Macedonian theater, motion picture and television actor, stand up comedian, presenter and showman. Mihajlovski was born in Kumanovo, Yugoslavia on the 1st of July, 1967. After completing The Faculty of Arts in Skopje at the Ss. Cyril and Methodius University in Skopje he became a member of the drama section in the Macedonian National Theater in 1994. During the 5th annual 'JoakimInterFest' in 2010 which took place in Kragujevac, Serbia, he received the award for best actor.
awards: Asociación de Cronistas Cinematográficos de la Argentina

artists.name: Sasko Kocev
artists.bio: Sasko Kocev is Macedonian actor and stand-up comedian. He finished his faculty in Skopje and graduated in the Faculty for Dramatic Arts in Skopje. He is very talented and he's probably one of the best Macedonian actors. He is well known for his hosting in lots of TV shows, festivals and happenings.
movies: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story

artists.name: Igor Dzambazov
artists.bio: Igor Dzambazov is a Macedonian actor, showman, TV presenter, comedian, singer, songwriter, and prosaist. He was born on July 15, 1963, in Skopje to composer Aleksandar Dzambazov and actress Ance Dzambazova. His grandfather was the renowned Macedonian actor Petre Prlicko.
awards: The Lebanese Cinema Movie Guide Awards

artists.name: Rade Sherbedzija
artists.bio: Rade Serbedzija was born in Bunic (Korenica) in 1946. Graduated from the Academy of Dramatic Arts in Zagreb. Still a student, he started to play the leading roles in films and theater productions. He is remembered as an outstanding Peer Gynt, Don Juan, Georgij, Melkior, Oedipus, Hamlet, Leon and Richard III. He wrote and published four books of poetry and released four albums, as well as directed 12 plays (Balade Petrice Kerempuha, Kazu da je sova nekad bila pekareva kci, Judita, Hrvatski slavuj...).

movies.title: Avatar
movies.plot: A paraplegic marine dispatched to the moon Pandora on a unique mission becomes torn between following his orders and protecting the world he feels is his home.

movies.title: I Am Legend
movies.writer: Mark Protosevich (screenplay), Akiva Goldsman (screenplay), Richard Matheson (novel), John William Corrington, Joyce Hooper Corrington
movies.plot: Years after a plague kills most of humanity and transforms the rest into monsters, the sole survivor in New York City struggles valiantly to find a cure.

movies.writer: Zack Snyder (screenplay), Kurt Johnstad (screenplay), Michael Gordon (screenplay), Frank Miller (graphic novel), Lynn Varley (graphic novel)
movies.plot: King Leonidas of Sparta and a force of 300 men fight the Persians at Thermopylae in 480 B.C.

movies.title: The Avengers
movies.writer: Joss Whedon (screenplay), Zak Penn (story), Joss Whedon (story)
movies.plot: Earth's mightiest heroes must come together and learn to fight as a team if they are to stop the mischievous Loki and his alien army from enslaving humanity.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 34 wins & 75 nominations.

movies.title: The Wolf of Wall Street
movies.plot: Based on the true story of Jordan Belfort, from his rise to a wealthy stock-broker living the high life to his fall involving crime, corruption and the federal government.
movies.awards: Nominated for 5 Oscars. Another 35 wins & 154 nominations.

movies.title: Interstellar
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Game of Thrones
movies.plot: While a civil war brews between several noble families in Westeros, the children of the former rulers of the land attempt to rise up to power. Meanwhile a forgotten race, bent on destruction, plans to return after thousands of years in the North.
movies.awards: Won 1 Golden Globe. Another 185 wins & 334 nominations.

movies.title: Vikings
movies.plot: The world of the Vikings is brought to life through the journey of Ragnar Lothbrok, the first Viking to emerge from Norse legend and onto the pages of history - a man on the edge of myth.
movies.language: English, Old English, Norse, Old, Latin
movies.awards: Nominated for 7 Primetime Emmys. Another 17 wins & 49 nominations.

movies.title: Gotham
movies.plot: The story behind Detective James Gordon's rise to prominence in Gotham City in the years before Batman's arrival.
movies.awards: Nominated for 4 Primetime Emmys. Another 3 wins & 22 nominations.

movies.title: Power
movies.plot: James "Ghost" St. Patrick, a wealthy New York night club owner who has it all, catering for the city's elite and dreaming big, lives a double life as a drug kingpin.

movies.title: Narcos
movies.writer: Carlo Bernard, Chris Brancato, Doug Miro, Paul Eckstein
movies.plot: A chronicled look at the criminal exploits of Colombian drug lord Pablo Escobar.
movies.awards: Nominated for 2 Golden Globes. Another 4 nominations.

movies.title: Breaking Bad
movies.plot: A high school chemistry teacher diagnosed with inoperable lung cancer turns to manufacturing and selling methamphetamine in order to secure his family's financial future.
movies.awards: Won 2 Golden Globes. Another 132 wins & 218 nominations.

movies.title: Doctor Strange
movies.writer: Scott Derrickson (screenplay), C. Robert Cargill (screenplay), Jon Spaihts (story by), Scott Derrickson (story by), C. Robert Cargill (story by), Steve Ditko (comic book)
movies.plot: After his career is destroyed, a brilliant but arrogant and conceited surgeon gets a new lease on life when a sorcerer takes him under her wing and trains him to defend the world against evil.

movies.title: Rogue One: A Star Wars Story
movies.writer: Chris Weitz (screenplay), Tony Gilroy (screenplay), John Knoll (story), Gary Whitta (story), George Lucas (characters)
movies.plot: The Rebellion makes a risky move to steal the plans to the Death Star, setting up the epic saga to follow.

movies.title: Assassin's Creed
movies.writer: Bill Collage (screenplay), Adam Cooper (screenplay), Michael Lesslie (screenplay)
movies.plot: When Callum Lynch explores the memories of his ancestor Aguilar and gains the skills of a Master Assassin, he discovers he is a descendant of the secret Assassins society.

movies.title: Luke Cage
movies.plot: Given superstrength and durability by a sabotaged experiment, a wrongly accused man escapes prison to become a superhero for hire.

movies.title: Toy Story
movies.writer: John Lasseter, Pete Docter, Andrew Stanton
movies.plot: A cowboy doll is profoundly threatened and jealous when a new spaceman action figure supplants him as top toy in a boy's bedroom.
movies.awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. 29 wins & 23 nominations total

movies.title: WALL·E
movies.writer: Andrew Stanton, Pete Docter, Jim Reardon
movies.plot: In the distant future, a small waste-collecting robot inadvertently embarks on a space journey that will ultimately decide the fate of mankind.

movies.title: The World of Despicable Me
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Monsters, Inc.
movies.director: Pete Docter, David Silverman, Lee Unkrich
movies.writer: Pete Docter, Jill Culton, Jeff Pidgeon
movies.plot: In order to power the city, monsters have to scare children so that they scream. However, the children are toxic to the monsters, and after a child gets through, two monsters realize things may not be what they think.

movies.title: Ice Age: The Meltdown
movies.writer: Peter Gaulke, Gerry Swallow, Jim Hecht
movies.plot: Manny, Sid and Diego discover that the ice age is coming to an end, and join everybody for a journey to higher ground. On the trip, they discover that Manny is not in fact the last of the woolly mammoths.

movies.title: O.J.: Made in America
movies.plot: A chronicle of the rise and fall of O.J. Simpson, whose high-profile murder trial exposed the extent of American racial tensions, revealing a fractured and divided nation.

movies.title: Taylor Swift: The Eras Tour
movies.plot: Experience the Eras Tour concert, performed by the one and only Taylor Swift.

movies.title: Juzni vetar
movies.plot: Petar Maras continues his expansion in criminal underworld while saving his family.

movies.title: Balcancan
movies.plot: A Macedonian military deserter and his Italian blood-brother are searching for a dead grandmother wrapped up in a stolen carpet, all over the Balkan's criminal underworld.
movies.language: Macedonian, Albanian, Bulgarian, Croatian, Russian, Italian

movies.title: Dajte Muzika
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Sisterhood
movies.plot: The friendship of two adolescent girls is threatened the moment they have to face the dire repercussions of their manipulative behaviour.

movies.title: The Third Half
movies.producers: Robert Naskov, Darko Mitrevski, Nuala Quinn-Barton
movies.plot: Dimitry hires German coach Rudolph Spitz to galvanize his ragtag team into the country's best football club, but then the first Nazi tanks roll in and Rebecca, a local banker's beautiful daughter, elopes with his star player.
movies.language: Macedonian, German, Ladino, Bulgarian, English, Serbian, Spanish
movies.country: North Macedonia, Czech Republic, United States

movies.title: Zona Zamfirova
movies.plot: The plot follows the story of Zona Zamfirova (Katarina Radivojevic), a local rich man's daughter, and the vicissitudes of her affair with Mane (Vojin Cetkovic), an ordinary goldsmith. As it was undesirable for the daughter of a ri...

movies.title: Terminator
movies.plot: A cyborg comes from the future, to kill a girl named Sarah Lee.

movies.title: From Now
movies.plot: The series begins when the USS HOPE, a famed lost spaceship, returns to Earth after vanishing 35 years prior. The lone survivor, voiced by Madden, disembarks mysteriously looking the exact same age as when he left. Following the ensu

movies.title: Missy
movies.plot: A team of explorers travel through a wormhole in space in an attempt to ensure humanity's survival.

movies.title: Call Her Daddy
movies.plot: Call Her Daddy started as a podcast and evolved into a global movement. Alex Cooper bulldozed a lane of her own, spitting in the face of misogyny and putting a modern twist on feminism.

movies.title: Oliver Twist
movies.plot: Oliver Twist is born in a workhouse in 1830s England. His mother, whose name no one knows, is found on the street and dies just after Oliver's birth. Oliver spends the first nine years of his life in a badly run home for young orp...

movies.title: Harley Quinn: A Very Problematic Valentine's Day Special
movies.plot: Harley and Ivy are celebrating their very first Valentine's Day together. Also follows the rest of the ragtag crew and how they spend the gushiest, mushiest, most romantic day of the year.

movies.title: Familijata Markovski
movies.plot: A series that portraits the life, political scene, social behaviours, and the educational and the health systems in Republic of Macedonia, through the lives of the five members of the Markovski family.
